question: FRL service unit does following functions.....
.....are the methods of actuation of pneumatic directional control valves.
4/2 way pneumatic direction control valve has:

answers.a: Working Port:2, Supply port: 1, Exhaust port: 1
answers.b: Working Port:1, Supply port: 1, Exhaust port: 2
answers.c: Working Port:1, Supply port: 2, Exhaust port: 1
answers.d: Working Port:2, Supply port: 1, Exhaust port: 2
